about_the_game:
Discover the mesmerizing world of Bloodbound through its exceptional soundtrack! Our music producers have woven a rich tapestry of sounds and melodies that breathe life into the game's immersive atmosphere. "Bloodbound: The Soundtrack" is an auditory journey that spans various genres, including rock, metal, industrial, rap, and techno, ensuring there's something for every music enthusiast.

One intriguing aspect of this album is that some of the rap vocals were contributed by none other than our talented programmer, Sketch. This unique blend of in-house talent adds a personal touch to the soundtrack that you won't find anywhere else.

The music for Bloodbound was skillfully composed by a team of renowned music producers. Michael Richard, Ricardo "DJ FExxx" Gutierrez, Veska, and CrazySktch have all lent their creative prowess to this project, resulting in a soundtrack that perfectly complements the game's intense and captivating world.

Whether you're a fan of rock's raw energy, the dark and brooding tones of metal, the mechanical precision of industrial music, the lyrical rhythms of rap, or the futuristic vibes of techno, "Bloodbound: The Soundtrack" has something special in store for you. Immerse yourself in the sonic realm of Bloodbound and let the music carry you away on an unforgettable adventure.
